documents.title: Machine Learning Fundamentals
documents.body: This document contains some information about machine learning but doesn't mention it frequently.
documents.description: A brief overview of machine learning concepts.

documents.title: Data Analysis Methods
documents.body: Machine learning techniques are essential for modern data analysis. Machine learning algorithms can process large datasets efficiently. Machine learning models can identify patterns that humans might miss. Machine learning is transforming how we approach data science problems.
documents.description: Overview of data analysis with some machine learning references.

documents.title: Advanced Machine Learning Techniques
documents.body: This document discusses various data analysis methods.
documents.description: Deep dive into machine learning algorithms and their applications.

documents.title: Introduction to Data Science
documents.body: Data science encompasses various techniques including statistics and programming.
documents.description: Machine learning is a key component of modern data science approaches.

documents.title: Programming for Data Analysis
documents.body: Programming languages like Python are essential for data analysis and machine learning projects.
documents.description: Learn how to use programming for data analysis tasks.

queries.description: When 'title' field is weighted higher, fw3 should rank higher than fw2 despite fw2 having more occurrences in the body
When 'body' field is weighted higher, fw2 should rank higher than fw3 due to more occurrences
When 'description' field is weighted higher, fw3 should rank higher than others
When 'tags' field is weighted higher, fw3 and fw4 should rank higher
